name: places/ChIJ2-nCbrJZwokRdESPxLVaoto
formattedAddress: 466 Amsterdam Ave, New York, NY 10024, USA
adrFormatAddress: 466 Amsterdam Ave, New York, NY 10024, USA

originalText.text:
I recently visited Craft + Carry on the Upper West Side in New York City with my wife. It was a lovely Tuesday early evening.  I am in a mechanical wheelchair & it was accessible. We would prefer the outside but no seats available.  There was room in the bar. I stay in my chair, my wife on a stool. The staff was very helpful & accommodating. They made sure that we had enough space to move around in my wheelchair & that we could easily access the bar.  The staff was helpful & friendly, & they made sure that we were comfortable. We had a great time enjoying the craft beers & the atmosphere.  The atmosphere was relaxed. It was a great place to relax and enjoy a few beers.
* The beer selection was excellent. We tried a few different beers and they were all delicious.

Overall, I had a positive experience at Craft + Carry. I would definitely recommend it to others, especially those who are looking for a wheelchair-accessible craft beer bar with friendly and helpful staff.

Now, I am pretty sure later in the evening and in weekends it gets crowded.  In that case, it will be difficult to move around.

originalText.text: Very clean and well Laid out upper west side bar. Their hook is a wide selection of microbrewery beers and they don't disappoint. The selection was actually so big. It couldn't decide which beer I would want. Luckily the bartender saw my indecisiveness and came over to help me make a selection. He was extremely knowledgeable about the different types of microbrewers. Also very clean bathrooms. Oh, and the tables had this really cool ring and hook game. Which took a second to figure out, but once I did it was very addictive.

originalText.text: This is now the second location I visit with craft+carry. Located on the upper west side means up pay the price but when your into craft beer you should expect that. They have a GREAT selection of beers as well as ciders and even a draft section that I didn’t get to snap a photo of but did get the menu of drafts. I will definitely be coming back to this location!

originalText.text: Cute and comfortable place for drinks. They had a speed-dating night that looks so cute and well-organized. Great servers/bartenders!

text.text: Cute and comfortable place for drinks. They had a speed-dating night that looks so cute and well-organized. Great servers/bartenders!

originalText.text: Craft+Carry is a cool craft beer bar located throughout the City. However, the one I went to is on the Upper West Side, which has knowledgeable, kind, and thoughtful bartenders. Craft+Carry’s UWS tap selection is also decent. They have a good variety of different styles of beers. The venue’s ambiance is better than average for a craft beer bar. The only complaint I have is, each beer can they sell in their bottle shop to go, costs as much as each tap beer you buy while sitting in the joint. My advice is, don’t waste your money buying beer cans to go. The prices are exorbitant!! Do yourself a favor and go to Broadway Dive (Broadway and 101 St). They have an awesome selection and the beers to go are priced much more reasonable. Further, find yourself a good grocery store that sells high end craft beer and go there. You’ll save yourself a TON of money!!
